src/lib/components/DashGantt.react.js.description:
DashGantt is a Gantt chart component for scheduling.
It displays professionals vertically and time horizontally.
Users can add, modify, and remove timeslots for each professional.
The component outputs data that can be used in a prediction model.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

professionals.description:
List of professionals to display in the Gantt chart.
Each professional should have an id and name.

timeslots.description:
List of timeslots to display in the Gantt chart.
Each timeslot should have an id, professionalId, start time, end time, and date.

date.description: The date to display in the Gantt chart (YYYY-MM-DD).

startHour.description: The start hour of the day (e.g., 6 for 6:00 AM).

endHour.description: The end hour of the day (e.g., 24 for midnight).

slotDuration.description: The duration of each slot in minutes.

backgroundColor.description: The background color for the header row.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
